doc.name: ImagePartition
doc.description: Partition an image into smaller subimages. Each input image should have dimensions imageColumns by imageRows, and each output image will have dimensions partitionColumns by partitionRows. The output matrices are row scanned from the top of input image.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: The width of the input matrices.
The height of the input matrices.
The width of the input partitions.
The height of the input partitions.
